src.kgfoundry_common.config
===========================

.. py:module:: src.kgfoundry_common.config

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Module for kgfoundry_common.config.

   NavMap:
   - NavMap: Structure describing a module navmap.
   - load_config: Load a YAML configuration file from ``path``.





Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: load_config(path)

   Load a YAML configuration file from ``path``.

   :param path: Path to the configuration file on disk.
   :type path: str

   :returns: Parsed configuration values.
   :rtype: dict[str, Any]
